customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
CTRL/CMD+U
--------------------
1. Press CTRL+U (Windows) or CMD+U (Mac)
2. Choose any file to upload
3. Wait for upload to finish and observe text box has focus
4. Press ENTER
inline.expectedResult: A new post appears with the attachment chosen in step 2
